comments: Log(32) = 10*log(2)/2 = 5*log(2) = 5*A002162, so 10*(1/2 - 1/4 + 1/6 - 1/8 + 1/10 - 1/2n ...) = log(32). - _Eric Desbiaux_, Nov 26 2008-log(2)/2 is the limit for n -> infinity of ((Sum_{k=2..n} arctanh(1/k)) - log(n)). - _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Aug 07 2014, after Steven Finch
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 2.
